title: The only reason why Cleanse still exists is because sometimes Vayne uses it
body:
Its a niche spell used by hardly anyone except Vayne once in a blue moon, might as well get rid of it too and force us to have no "troll" summoner spells since that can obviously stop any trolling by getting rid of one venue of trolling. I bet you 1 piece of paper that if Clarity restored energy and Faker used it in one BIG LCS PLAYS game and did something amazing with it, we would still have it.

This is not a Clarity Vengenance Thread
